QuestData.Title: Creating the Ink
QuestData.Description: We need a way to create an artificial nexus at your tower.$B$BI know where we can get the conduit to do that, but it's well-guarded. We need to keep our cool and do this the right way.$B$BI have a plan - a scroll of mass teleportation.$B$BThe fungal giants and shamblers down below are covered with pustules full of an oily substance. We can use the oil to craft a makeshift ink substitute for the scroll.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Pulsating Pustules from Sporebats and Fungal Giants in Zangarra.
